meanings.definition: Poisonous fluid secreted by snakes and certain other animals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the venin of the snake to understand its effects.
meanings.sent2: The venin of the spider can be harmful if injected into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy thief accidentally spilled venin on himself, causing chaos in the hideout.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like venin, spreading toxicity in the office environment.
meanings.sent5: The venin dripped from the fangs of the viper, ready to strike.
